Uses of Package
peril.model.combat

  • Packages that use peril.model.combat 
    Package Description
    peril.model.combat  
    peril.model.states  
    peril.views.slick.components.menus  
  • Classes in peril.model.combat used by peril.model.combat 
    Class and Description
    CombatHelper
    Helps the game by performing a round of combat denoted by a CombatRound passed to CombatHelper.fight(CombatRound).
    CombatRound
    Denotes a round of combat that can be processed by the CombatHelper.
    CombatView
    Denotes the results of a CombatRound being processed by the CombatHelper.
    ModelSquad
    A squad of ModelSquadMembers that originated from a ModelArmy and will be used in combat by the CombatHelper.
    ModelSquadMember
    A member of a ModelSquad this object wraps a ModelUnit an gives it the additional state of being dead or alive.
    ModelSquadMemberState
    The states that a ModelSquadMember can have in a ModelSquad.
  • Classes in peril.model.combat used by peril.model.states 
    Class and Description
    CombatHelper
    Helps the game by performing a round of combat denoted by a CombatRound passed to CombatHelper.fight(CombatRound).
  • Classes in peril.model.combat used by peril.views.slick.components.menus 
    Class and Description
    ModelSquad
    A squad of ModelSquadMembers that originated from a ModelArmy and will be used in combat by the CombatHelper.
    ModelSquadMember
    A member of a ModelSquad this object wraps a ModelUnit an gives it the additional state of being dead or alive.
